casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. SAMUEL BARRETTO Stephen F. Cashman, special public defender, in support of the petition. Marjorie Allen Dauster, assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided October 31, 2000

NORCOTT and VERTEFEUILLE, Js., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this petition.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
